channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bezos's Twitch Bans Streamer Nickmercs for Using the Term 'Tranny,' Compares It to 'N-Word'
Biden tells congressional Democrats that calling for him to drop out 'only helps Trump and hurts us'
item.description: President Biden is urging congressional Democrats to stop questioning whether he should end his re-election bid and â€œmove forward as a unified party" in order to defeat Trump in their 2024 rematch.

item.title: Rep. Luna to Force Vote on Fines for AG Garland
item.description: Rep. Anna Paulina Luna, R-Fla., is planning to force legislators to vote on whether to fine Attorney General Merrick Garland up to $10,000 per day that he does not comply with a congressional subpoena, Politico Playbook reports.

item.title: Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer Breaks Silence on Replacing Biden in 2024
Hollywood elites, megadonors turn on Biden amid growing calls for new Democratic nominee
item.description: Hollywood Democrat megadonors are calling for President Biden to step down as the party's nominee amid backlash over his debate performance.

item.title: Republicans Weigh 25th Amendment Vote Against Biden
item.description: House Republicans are considering a resolution calling for the invocation of the 25th Amendment to remove President Joe Biden after his disastrous debate performance June 27, Politico reported.

item.title: NEA President Gives 'Totally Unhinged' Political Doomsday Speech at National Meeting
Dems' 'deeply self-destructive' attacks on Biden to blame for weakening his candidacy, lawmaker says
item.description: A House Democrat who supports President Biden's reelection campaign is slamming members of his own party for "weakening" Biden's chances with public criticism of his debate performance.

item.title: Rep. Lawler to Newsmax: Public Not Convinced Biden Fit to Serve
item.description: President Joe Biden's interview with ABC News on Friday night did not help convince the American people that he is fit to run again for the White House, Rep. Mike Lawler told Newsmax on Monday.

item.title: Even Jen 'Circle Back' Psaki Has to Get Real: Things Are Dire for Biden Campaign
Biden staff prepped him on how to enter, exit fundraiser room: report
item.description: A document President Biden's staffer used to prepare him for a recent fundraiser includes detailed instructions for where to walk, enter and exit places.

item.title: Caroline Sunshine to Newsmax: Dems Should Just Sit This Election Out
item.description: Caroline Sunshine, deputy communications director for the Trump campaign, told Newsmax on Monday that the Democrats should sit the 2024 presidential election out rather than run President Joe Biden because results from the latest surveys indicate he isn't likely to win.

item.title: Desperate Democrats Circulate 'Our Finest Hour' Plan to Replace Biden... IF He Drops Out
Trump approval rating tops 50% as he leads Biden on voters' top two issues: poll
item.description: A poll found former President Trump's approval rating is above 50%, leading President Biden on economy and immigration, two top issues of the 2024 race.

item.title: Biden 'Firmly Committed' to Reelection Bid: Time for Party Drama 'to End'
item.description: President Joe Biden stood firm against calls for him to drop his candidacy and called for an "end" to the intraparty drama that has torn apart Democrats about whether he should stay in the race after his dismal public debate performance.
